items.content_html: This project uses Typescript, Node, Express, Serverless framework, and AWS DynamoDB to create a products API that is compliant with OpenAPI specifications. It uses the TSOA framework to convert Typescript to Swagger templates. It also includes E2E/Integration tests.
items.title: zkula/OpenAPI-Products: This project uses Typescript, Node, Express, Serverless framework, and AWS DynamoDB to create a products API that is compliant with OpenAPI specifications. It uses the TSOA framework to convert Typescript to Swagger templates. It also includes E2E/Integration tests.
